Posts.Title: Stage III Cancer Survivors .... 10+ Years and Out AlwaysHope karen1956

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2015 09:25PM Ruska wrote: Hello everyone! I was recently diagnosed with IDC BC. I'm so scared. It's just me and my daughter , I have no other relatives. I'm 38 and she is 19. I want to help her to finish the college and instead she is working and taking care if me. I try to stay positive, but it's so hard. I cry from time to time. If anybody can give me an advice how to control myself. I'm so scared.
Posts.Title: Stage III Cancer Survivors .... 10+ Years and Out AlwaysHope karen1956
